Math Tomorrow is our first math test. Tonight your homework is to look over all the Topic 1 lessons and especially the assessment pages we practiced in class. The test will be very similar to those pages, so if you study them carefully, youâ€™ll be ready. Please have your child practice a little Khan Academy math each night at https://www.khanacademy.org/join/VK6QDS9E to help strengthen their skills. Science Read over pages 6-13 (except page 7) and make sure all the questions on each page are answered. Language Arts Complete pages 18-19 in the Grammar Workshop book.
